short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add a minified bookmarks toolbar to the context menu.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add a minified bookmarks toolbar to the context menu. How to Quick Bookmark a page Right click on any page to open the context menu. Hover over the Quick Bookmarks option to open the Quick Bookmarks menu. Then click Create Quick Bookmark.
